metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2953 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in openldap. This security flaw causes a nullpointer dereference in ber_memalloc_x() function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1
libldap-common - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1
slapd - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openldap package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.11+esm1').
